metalign

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • metalign.Main

  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    The Main class is used to perform any function of this project. This is the main interface which should be used to test any of the functionality of the beat tracking project.

    Usage can be found in the javadoc comments for the main(String[]) method.

    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 11 Feb, 2015

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                        java.io.IOException,
                        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                        org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException
        The main method for running this program.

        Usage: java -cp bin metalign.Main [ARGS] input1 [input2...]

        Where each input is either a file or a directory. Each file listed as input, and each file beneath every directory listed as input (recursively) is read as input.

        ARGS:
        • -T = Use tracks as correct voice (instead of channels) *Only used for MIDI files.
        • -p = Use verbose printing.
        • -P = Use super verbose printing.
        • -l = Print logging (time, hypothesis count, and notes at each step).
        • -J = Run with incremental joint processing.
        • -VClass = Use the given class for voice separation. (FromFile (default) or Hmm)
        • -BClass = Use the given class for beat tracking. (FromFile (default) or Hmm).
        • -HClass = Use the given class for hierarchy detection. (FromFile (default) or lpcfg).
        • -g FILE = Load a grammar in from the given file. Used only with -Hlpcfg.
        • -x = Extract the trees of the song for testing from the loaded grammar when testing. Used only with -Hlpcfg.
        • -e = Extend each note within each voice to the next note's onset.
        • -m INT = For beat tracking and hierarchy detection, throw out notes whose length is shorter than INT microseconds, once extended.
        • -s INT = Use INT as the sub beat length.
        • -b INT = Use INT as the beam size.
        • -v INT = Use INT as the voice beam size.
        • -E FILE = Print out the evaluation for each hypothesis as well with the given FILE as ground truth.
        • -a FILE = Search recursively under the given FILE for anacrusis files.
        Parameters:
        args - String array with the args described above.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - An interrupt occurred in GUI mode.
        java.io.IOException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException

      • validateModelClasses

        private static void validateModelClasses(java.lang.String voiceClass,
                                         java.lang.String beatClass,
                                         java.lang.String hierarchyClass)
        Ensure that the given model class Strings are valid. This method will halt exectution of the code if the any of them are not valid.
        Parameters:
        voiceClass - The voice class String.
        beatClass - The beat class String.
        hierarchyClass - The hierarchy class String.

      • getJointModel

        private static JointModel getJointModel(java.lang.String voiceClass,
                                        java.lang.String beatClass,
                                        java.lang.String hierarchyClass,
                                        EventParser ep,
                                        TimeTracker tt,
                                        MetricalLpcfg grammar)
                                 throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException
        Get a joint model given the model class Strings (alread validated with validateModelClasses(String, String, String)), an event parser, and a time tracker.
        Parameters:
        voiceClass - The voice class String.
        beatClass - The beat class String.
        hierarchyClass - The hierarchy class String.
        ep - The event parser.
        tt - The time tracker.
        Returns:
        A joint model which can be used to perform inference jointly.
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException

      • getVoiceState

        private static VoiceSplittingModelState getVoiceState(java.lang.String voiceClass,
                                                      EventParser ep)
                                               throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException
        Load and return a voice state given the voice class String.
        Parameters:
        voiceClass - The voice class String.
        ep - An event parser, used in case the voice class String is FromFile (default).
        Returns:
        The voice state requested by the voice class String.
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException

                                                   TimeTracker tt)
        Load and return a beat state given the beat class String.
        Parameters:

        tt - A time tracker, used in case the beat class String is FromFile (default).

      • argumentError

        private static void argumentError(java.lang.String message)
        An argument error occurred. Print the usage help info to standard error, and then exit.

        NOTE: This method calls System.exit(1) and WILL NOT return.

        Parameters:
        message - The error message to print at the beginning of the exception.
